tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE travel_expenditures (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    spending_category VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    expense_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE travel_expenditures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  travel_destination VARCHAR(50),
  travel_date DATE,
  expenditure_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE travel_expenses (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	expense_date DATE,
	category VARCHAR(50),
	amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE guest_expenses (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  guest_id INT NOT NULL,
  expense_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  expense_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  expense_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cost_savings_opportunities (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  potential_savings DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  opportunity_date DATE NOT NULL
);
